instructions.ar: انعطف يساراً قليلاً لتبقى على Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.da: Drej let til venstre videre ad Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.de: Leicht links weiter auf Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.en: Make a slight left to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ete maldekstren al Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Dobla levemente a la izquierda en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es-ES: Doble levemente a la izquierda en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fi: Jatka loivasti vasempaan pysyäksesi tiellä Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à gauche pour rester sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.he: פנה קלות שמאלה כדי להישאר על Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.hu: Forduljon enyhén balra, majd maradjon a Cool highway (Ref1) szakaszon
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kiri ke Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.it: Fai una leggera curva a sinistra per stare su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ja: 斜め左に曲がり、Cool highway(Ref1)を進む
instructions.ko: 약간 좌회전 하고 Cool highway (Ref1)로 가세요.
instructions.my: Cool highway( Ref1)ပေါ်တွင်နေရန် ဘယ်ဘက်အနည်းငယ်ကွေ့ပါ
instructions.nl: Links afbuigen om op Cool highway (Ref1) te blijven
instructions.no: Sving svakt til venstre for å bli værende på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Skręć w lewo w łagodny zakręt, aby pozostać na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva suave a esquerda para manter-se na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-PT: Vire ligeiramente à esquerda para se manter em Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ro: Virați ușor la stânga pe Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните налево на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sl: Zavijte rahlo levo, da ostanete na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Sväng vänster och fortsätt på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.tr: Cool highway (Ref1) üzerinde kalmak için sola hafif dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть плавно ліворуч щоб залишитись на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên trái để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.yo: Ṣe diẹ si osi lati duro si Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.zh-Hans: 前方稍向左转，继续在Cool highway（Ref1）上行驶
